channel.title: Placeholder names in crypto
channel.description:
We are all familiar with Alice, Bob and Eve. But who knew there are other mischievous bastards like Grace and Heidi?
(Apologies to anyone who coincidentally has the same names - this is about systems designs in a narrow context).
https://www.revolvy.com/main/index.php?s=Placeholder%20names%20in%20cryptography&item_type=topic&nojs=1

item.title: Placeholder names in crypto

item.description:
We are all familiar with Alice, Bob and Eve. But who knew there are other mischievous bastards like Grace and Heidi?

(Apologies to anyone who coincidentally has the same names - this is about systems designs in a narrow context).

revolvy.com

Placeholder names in cryptography | Revolvy

Placeholder names in cryptography Alice and Bob are fictional characters commonly used as placeholder names in cryptology, as well as science and engineering literature. The Alice and Bob characters were invented by Ron Rivest, Adi Shamir, and...
